entries.journal_entry_description: While dealing with threatened violence from four disreputable thugs in his office, Jonas Nova accidentally shot Katiara Orion while defending himself. Garrick Orion's young daughter was killed almost instantly. The four thugs fled. Hunt them down!
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Four thugs who were threatening Jonas Nova helped cause the death of Katiara Orion. Find and destroy these four thugs.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Among the debris of Viado Klivian's ship, you found a small satchel that belonged to Katiara Orion. The only thing of interest inside is one of her favored toys. You should bring this toy back to Nova Orion Station. But should you give it to Garrick Orion or to Jonas Nova?
entries.task03_message_box_text: Among the debris of Viado Klivian's ship, you found a small satchel that belonged to Katiara Orion. The only thing of interest inside is one of her favored toys. You should bring this toy back to Nova Orion Station. But should you give it to Garrick Orion or to Jonas Nova?
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Katiara's toy should obviously go to her father. That is the right thing to do. Drag the toy onto Garrick Orion if this is your choice.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Katiara's toy should be given to Jonas Nova. If he were to return the toy to Garrick Orion, perhaps they would be able to make amends. Drag the toy onto Jonas Nova if this is your choice.
